comments.author: Alexander Klimetschek
comments.body:
Patch for the 1.3 branch.

Also includes https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JCR-1116 backported for the bundle PMs (ie. excluding persistence/db/DatabasePersistenceManager which got logging in JCR-1116 as well).

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Applied the product patch (without the JCR-1116 changes) in revision 631371.

I committed the JCR-1116 changes separately in revision 631379 and will use the JCR-1116 issue itself to track that change in the 1.3.4 release notes.

Added the test case from JCR-1419 in revision 631397 and supporting code from JCR-1412 in revision 631382. Note that the test case doesn't work on Windows and I have some other issues about it, but I'll follow up in JCR-1419 about that. For the 1.3.4 release I think the current test is fine.

Resolving as Fixed. Thanks for the great work!

description: Backport issue JCR-940 ( add db connection autoConnect for BundleDbPersistenceManager) to 1.3 branch for 1.3.4 (separate issue to avoid re-opening JCR-940 which was already released with 1.4).
